H0.text: The first Paralympic Games to officially tie in with the Summer Olympics were held in 1960 in which city. Tokyo

H1.text: The first Paralympic Games to officially tie in with the Summer Olympics were held in 1960 in which city. London

H2.text: The first Paralympic Games to officially tie in with the Summer Olympics were held in 1960 in which city. Stockholm

H3.text: The first Paralympic Games to officially tie in with the Summer Olympics were held in 1960 in which city. R≈çma

A4.text: The Games were held in Rome, Italy from September 18 to 25, 1960, with the 1960 Summer Olympics.
